title: ‘Reservation Dogs,’ ‘What If…?,’ and a Conversation With Andrew Haigh and Jack O’Connell of ‘The North Water’
description:
Chris and Andy talk about ‘The White Lotus’ getting renewed for a second season (3:54) before getting into the first episodes of ‘Reservation Dogs’ (10:42) and the Marvel animation series ‘What If…?’ (20:17). Then Chris is joined by ‘The North Water’ director Andrew Haigh and actor Jack O’Connell to talk about creating the intense new TV show (33:45).

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald
Guests: Andrew Haigh and Jack O’Connell
Producer: Kaya McMullen
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
